text: The men's KL2 competition at the 2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Szeged took place at the Olympic Centre of Szeged. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | rowspan=2|Wednesday 21 August 2019 || 09:10 || Heats |- | 12:20 || Semifinals |- | rowspan=2|Saturday 24 August 2019 || 10:05 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 10:15
